attributes.action: Insist the US provides explanation as to why J. Miah was denied entry to the US.
attributes.additional_details: The UK Foreign Office has even stated that no one with a British passport will be denied entry to the US - so why?
attributes.background: Juhel Miah was denied entry to the US based on nothing tangible. Seemingly the reason doesn't even link to the disproportionate and now illegal travel ban enforced by Donald Trump's administration.
